abstrac: Push the boundaries on what is already done and translate ideas through innovation, story-telling, and skill.
bio: I am a fashion designer, illustrator, and instructor with a passion for all things art and business. At the beginning of last year, I started getting artwork commissions for people's gifts and businesses. My artwork gave me the ability to fund and start teaching a fashion business program. Once I grow both endeavors to a higher level of success, I'll then be able to start an animal rights nonprofit too. That is my ultimate life purpose :)

I always give a layout to clients with a possible timeline to pursue their project. Payment is always before I start project, no exception. You can have a contract for me or request me to have one for us. The best ways to communicate with me would be through email angelica@velvetkat.com and text. I would also take meeting in person or Skype call over talking on the phone.

bio: Dreamlize Consulting is a full service CPA & business consulting firm that specializes in working with individuals and small business owners in the areas of finance, accounting, tax, business and management issues. We are a staff of seventeen professionals with a minimum of 20 years experience in accounting and business consulting. We are all licensed CPA's and we all hold graduate degree's in business management and accounting. We have worked with over 6,000 individuals and business owners over the past 7 years and we look forward to working with you on your financial needs and goals.

50% payment required upon start of project
50% payment balance upon completion of project

bio:
All types of writing projects undertaken, including:
- user documentation for IT systems
- magazine articles, case studies, blogs, reports
- website content.
All projects are fully researched, properly structured and produced in line with your requirements. A professional and reliable service is assured and you will be kept fully informed of progress.

All work is generally undertaken on a fixed price basis so that you know the cost in advance - either per project for technical writing assignments or per word for articles and similar output. This avoids the uncertainty of payment by the hour when the end result is unknown.
